description: The different components of [Machete](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0409) are executed by Windows Task Scheduler.(Citation: ESET Machete July 2019)(Citation: Securelist Machete Aug 2014)

external_references.description: ESET. (2019, July). MACHETE JUST GOT SHARPER Venezuelan government institutions under attack. Retrieved September 13, 2019.
Kaspersky Global Research and Analysis Team. (2014, August 20). El Machete. Retrieved September 13, 2019.
